snippet.title: Best of Book of Mario 64 [Section 1]
snippet.description:
Book of Mario 64 is a FULLY Google Translated mod for Paper Mario 64. Every single line in the game has been translated to various other languages back to English, resulting in some horrible mistranslations.

After the I've finished the game, the mod will be released for others to play and explore. There's no way I can show off everything in my playthrough. The download link will be on the final stream.

Book of Mario 64 Reveal Trailer ►https://youtu.be/-M_EEfDMzgc
Book of Mario 64 Intro Cutscene ►https://youtu.be/qgffuZ9ya-Y
Original Book of Mario Playlist ►https://bit.ly/2YTjx7P
Best of Book of Mario: Thousands of Doors ►https://bit.ly/2YWlXqc
BOOK OF MARIO WIKI ►https://goo.gl/HmVjub

STAY UPDATED by joining my Discord ►https://discord.gg/FFEz5jF
Support me on Patreon ►https://www.patreon.com/Fatguy703
